author: kkolinko
msg: Fix several issues with the schema, aligning it with actual output generated by StatusTransformer class.
1. Add memorypool element to status.xsd schema.
2. There is no minSpareThreads attribute on threadInfo. Removed it from xsl file as well.
To test, one can save output of /manager/status?XML=true command and
add the following attributes to the root <status> element:

author: jglick
msg: Was not compatible to make systemClasspath (and systemBootClasspath) final; the NetBeans Ant integration in fact overwrites this value (for a reason).

author: lbernardo
msg: FOP-2217: Image scaling change was adversely affecting other image types; the consequence is that the previous commit, associated with XGC-77, needs to be reverted.
